  • Does this vitamin C create acidity after consumption?

    No, it contains Calcium Ascorbate- a non-acidic form of vitamin C that is gentle on stomach and may not create acidity.

  • Is it a chewable vitamin C or need to consume with water?

    No, these are not chewable tablets, you need to consume it with water.

  • Does this vitamin C tablets taste sweet?

    No, it has natural taste of added herbs & vitamin blend and doesn't contains any added flavour.

  • Does this ashwagandha help in prolonged workout?

    Yes, Ashwagandha is a natural herb which is known to enhance stamina and energy levels which helps you in doing exeercise for prolonged duration.

  • Does this ashwagandha help in gaining weight?

    Stress is another reason that causes hurdle in weight gain. As ashwagandha aids in reducing stress and anxiety, in turn, it may help to maintain your weight when taken with calorie rich diet.

  • Should I take Vitamin C tablet alone or with food?

    If you want to maximize their iron absorption, you should take vitamin C with iron-rich foods or supplements.

  • What are the common symptoms of Vitamin C deficiency?

    The preliminary symptoms of Vitamin C deficiency are: Tiredness and weakness, Joint and muscle pains, Easily getting bruised and Tiny red-blue spots like bruises on the skin.

    Vitamin E is a fat-soluble antioxidant that helps the skin fight free radical & stress related damage and also help protect from negative impacts of sun rays.

    • Does Daily Probiotics needs to be refrigerated?

      Yes, it requires refrigeration after opening. Storing probiotics in the refrigerator (not in the freezer) is recommended to maintain the probiotic’s viability. Many Probiotics are naturally sensitive to heat and moisture. Heat and moisture can reduce the viability of Probiotics. Hence, refrigeration is essential for the goodness of Probiotics. It ensures that its viability is maintained till its shelf life.

      neuherbs Deep Sea Fish Oil is made from deep sea cold water fatty fish sardine.

      Yes, you can use the Probiotics Capsule powder by pouring in milk.

      No, neuherbs Deep Sea Fish Oil is a lemon flvoured omega-3 which helps avoid unwanted bad fishy burps.

    • Is the Fish Oil molecularly distilled?

      Yes, neuherbs Deep Sea fish is molecularly distilled to avoid any heavy metal toxicity and make fish oil safe for human consumption.

    Milk Thistle is a natural herb supporting and maintaining liver health. It has an active ingredient known as silymarin, having anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. It helps maintain the body's detoxification, liver functioning and may aid in weight management.

  • Does it help detoxify liver?

    Yes, Milk thistle is a natural herb which helps detoxify liver and flush out toxins from the liver.

  • Is it helpful if I am taking alcohol?

    Yes, milk thistle helps manage the liver damage caused by excess alcohol intake.

    neuherbs Milk Thistle capsule provides 800 mg of silyamrin per serving i.e., 2 capsules
